MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G52 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Penilee Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.34pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Gleddoch Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.25pm on Tuesday 16th February 2021.
